nodes.text: The Art of Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi

The Art of Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi includes hundreds of sketches, storyboards, matte paintings, blueprints, production paintings, and costume designs which illustrate the original screenplay.
Originally published in 1983 as The Art of Return of the Jedi, the book was reissued in 1994 with the expanded title, and updated in 1997 to include material from the Special Edition.
